hero:title: Wir entkarbonisieren die Industrie mittels Eneuerbarer Gasbrennstoffe.
hero:quote: [DE] We turn energy to Renewable Natural Gas to provide you with a CO2 neutral energy solution.
dirk:quote: “Customers are demanding more and more reduction of emissions along the value chain.”
model:label: [DE] How it works
model:title: [DE] Synthesis and transport of green energy
model:text: [DE] The TURN2X plants are positioned next to renewable energy plants and convert water and CO2 with energy to Hydrogen and then to Methane. The RNG gets transported via the existing pipeline infrastructure to customers destinations: factories with high energy consumption.
mission:title: [DE] Displacing fossil fuels with modular RNG plants
mission:2030: [DE] x Million tonnes of CO2 avoided
mission:2014: [DE] Scale up of our standard plant module
mission:2023: [DE] Next iteration of design leads to further patents filed
mission:2022: [DE] Based on tech proof Turn2X was founded and scales up the tech
mission:2019: [DE] Plant Falkenhagen goes operational and first green molecules produced
mission:2018: [DE] Store & Go 26m EUR grant for building first plant

process:title: [DE] Certifiable RNG from methanation

process:section3: [DE] Producing renewable natural gas in our reactor
process:caption1: [DE] Our RNG is a certifiable energy source:
process:caption2: [DE] SFDR9 certification in planning for 2024. The TURN2X reactor is patented.
philip:description: [DE] Philip is a Cofounder and Chief Executive Officer at TURN2X. He has a track record of experience founding and running deep tech companies. In the past, Philip has raised millions in venture capital from international investors. Notable exits include the Karlsruhe based AI startup Understand.ai to hidden champion to Darmstadt based automotive software supplier DSPACE. His education includes a MSc. in Computer Science and Economics at KIT Karlsruhe.
benedikt:description: [DE] Benedikt is a Cofounder and Chief Finance Officer / Chief Operations Officer at TURN2X. Bens experience lies in project financing with project volumina above 100M EUR. After graduating his Masters in Physics at KIT Karlsruhe with a focus on solid state and quantum physics, he started his own VC fund which now holds over 30M EUR under management. At TURN2X, Benedikt finds ideal locations of building new plants and reducing capital expenses.
dominik:description: [DE] Dominik is a Cofounder and Chief Technology Officer at TURN2X. Dominik researches on the topics of power-to-gas, methanation and has experience in the engineering of parts and technology transfer from the lab in the demo scale for over 12 years. He received his PhD in Chemical engineering from KIT Karlsruhe. With several papers published and patents filed, Dominik oversees scientific progress in plant and reactor modularization, aswell as automation and the operative processes of building new plants. Through his work in management consulting, he gained in-depth knowledge of the energy industry and the challenges for the energy transformation.
stefan:position: [DE] Former Hydrogen Ambassador of the Federal Republic of Germany
evan:position: [DE] Built the Gigafactories for Tesla in NV and Berlin
